article.name: Integrate anecdotes with Your KnowBe4 Console
article.title: Integrate anecdotes with Your KnowBe4 Console
article.body:
In this article, you’ll learn how to integrate your anecdotes platform with your KnowBe4 console. This integration allows you to send phishing, training, and user data from your KnowBe4 console to your anecdotes platform to automate and manage your compliance program.

Note:Before you set up this integration, you'll need to copy the Reporting API Token from your KSAT Account Settings. For more information, see the API section of our KnowBe4 Console Account Settings: Account Integrations article.

To learn how to integrate your anecdotes platform with your KnowBe4 console, follow the steps below.

  1. Log in to your anecdotes platform.
  2. From the navigation menu on the left side of the page, click Plugins.
  3. On the Plugin Market page, search for the KnowBe4 plugin.
  4. Click the KnowBe4 plugin. You’ll be redirected to a setup page.
  5. In the API Token field, paste your Reporting API Token that you copied earlier.
  6. From the Server drop-down menu, select the region of your KnowBe4 account.
  7. Click Connect Plugin.

Once the connection is complete, you’ll see a success message verifying the connection.
